DOC.brief_summary: This randomised trial healthy volunteer , men woman age 50-75 year general community randomize one three arm : provide 50 gm extra virgin coconut oil , 50 gram butter 50 extra virgin olive oil eat daily month . The key outcome blood Low density lipoprotein cholesterol concentration secondary outcomes blood lipid profile ( total cholesterol , high density lipoprotein cholesterol , triglyceride ) anthropometric measure : weight waist circumference . This trial power detect difference 0.5 mmol/L LDL-cholesterol difference trial arm .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Different Dietary Fats Blood Lipids Metabolic Measures Healthy Participants
DOC.detailed_description: This randomized trial healthy volunteer general community randomize one three arm : consumption 50 gm extra virgin coconut oil daily OR 50gm butter daily OR 50gm extra virgin olive oil daily ( 50gm 2 ounce , 2 table spoon ) , consume one month period . The research participant recruit general community advertising ( BBC ) . After full informed consent , participant attend assessment visit baseline measure weight , height , waist circumference , blood pressure , blood sample assessment blood lipid metabolic marker , fill health questionnaire dietary questionnaire . They randomly allocate one three arm : coconut oil , butter olive oil give supply ( portion , measure spoon ) information daily consumption 50 gram one fat . After one month , return follow assessment include repeat blood sample , anthropometric measure blood pressure , questionnaire . Blood sample collect venepuncture store University Cambridge analyse Department Clinical Biochemistry , Cambridge University Addenbrooke 's Hospital . At end study , participant give result anthropometric measure lipid profile baseline follow well overall finding trial .
DOC.criteria: Willing participate trial dietary intervention one month within age range No known cardiovascular disease : heart disease stroke ; know cancer ; know diabetes ; use lipid lower medication eg . statin ; contraindication high fat diet e.g . gall bladder gastrointestinal condition
